documents.document: @cattlenclydes they might have been handed in at the bus stop/station, but they may be somewhere in Cork city. No need to worry,I'll survive
@RunDmcCork @billlking grand so it'll keep a different pair warm then.
@billlking @RunDmcCork I've a few buttons I could sew on to it.
@vandracarolyn @BibiBaskin that would buy a lot of glasses in flying tiger.
@GrangeWeb I know, all these lost things taking free trips.
@RunDmcCork oh good, I hope they'll be happy there. They nigh be cold they left there case behind. https://t.co/Yg8TvGf6c1
@BibiBaskin I don't think it works on ageing eyes, these are just reading glasses @vandracarolyn
@GrangeWeb they also had a screw loose!
@BibiBaskin @vandracarolyn I slightly melted the emergency pair in my cookery class tonight too. 😡
@IrPsych looking forward to it.
@GrangeWeb not to Clonmel, no. I hope they don't meet the inspector!
@vandracarolyn I try to have 3 pairs, upstairs, downstairs & one in my bag. Came across an old pair recently so I'm OK a while. @BibiBaskin
@BibiBaskin not the end of the world, I got them in flying tiger for €4.
I think I left a pair of glasses on the bus this afternoon, they are probably in Clonmel now! I liked them.
For a country that gets so much fecking rain, we are rubbish at guttering drainage!
@HappyMouffetard I understand, enjoy the break, might do the same too.
@wholesomeIE this might have been your chopper. https://t.co/0VJXfZzKoj
@OrlaCWalsh Will do thanks.
@OrlaCWalsh I like this #sugarsavvycard, Is it ok to use it in my cooking classes or do I need to ask the rooted project?
@MaudMonaghan @RTElyricfm I a way @martylyricfm is the midwife to each new day.
@doogarry happy birthday! Enjoy that coffee with @MaudMonaghan 🎂💐
@ShirleyHughes_ one of our favorites! Love the layout of the pictures outside on the left page, inside on the right page. Thank you.
@IrPsych oops, I fell asleep during #roomtoimprove, but was quite teary during #callthemidwife.
@keridavies "Sir, would you care to open the Ambridge fete this year? There'd be a pint or two of Shires in it for you."
@Nutradvance Ah I knew something was missing today! *heads off to raid the dark chocolate tuck box*
@BBCGQT Hi, Cicely Mary Barker wrote and illustrated the Flower Fairies books not Mable Luce Attwell.
@BibiBaskin I think it's the cold damp that has her so miserable.
Half term and Easter cooking camps @cookshopcork, book soon to avoid disappointment https://t.co/RGGjVXqYH0
@BibiBaskin Wouldn't you look miserable outside on a day like this?
@alex_meehan Is there a flu jab for chickens?
@nickykylegarden That's good to hear, take it easy & enjoy the rest. @MrBuddyPoor @tomdoorley
@SiobhanMoloney1 @carnsoreboxer Morning Shiv!
@carnsoreboxer morning, very sad about John Hurt.
@DervalORourke @b_fitzsimons Considering how many successful women athletes and coaches we have. I find it deeply sad!!!!
@MaryMc_31 well, the electorate are fickle, please god they don't reelected him.
@MaryMc_31 unless he gets reelected in 2020, like Obama did. There are no guarantees. Thank goodness!
@eatlikeagirl my nose is twitching !
@chefwademurphy Holliers, all the way!!!!!
@OrlaCWalsh that is a wonderful piece of advice!
@nickykylegarden that would not be good at all. Best of luck with the op! I'll be thinking of you! x @GerryKellyLL
@ProfTimNoakes it's mad, only a researcher would feet pure fat or sugar to mice, to see what happens to humans. No one eats like that!
@nickykylegarden hard to tell from a photograph best seen up close, but might be a type of blewit. Some were spotted elsewhere just before 🎅
@CorkSafetyAlert Ballydehob side of the rowing club, N71 crash
@CorkSafetyAlert crash on N71 after Skibbereen rowing club.
@MarionDorgan @tomdoorley thank you!
@HarshalShah @tomdoorley sure is! 'hick'!
@ThanePrince @tomdoorley we are, thank you 😊
@graapples you are adding to its cosmopolitanism, maybe have a conversation in Irish?
@Fireflys22 she looks a sweetheart!
@janet_t_55 just downloaded sky map. Hopefully that'll solve the mystery.
@waynemarlowe that would be a bit quick. :-) @IrishFoodGuide @janet_t_55 @JeniPim
@janet_t_55 great, thanks. 💐
@fuchsiadunlop they look like asparagus peas we grow here.
@IrishFoodGuide brilliant thank you! x
@janet_t_55 sadly it's beginning to get cloudy. I'll have another go tomorrow. It's very pretty.
@janet_t_55 I only know one, the plough, and it isn't close to that. It's almost over Ballycotton from here. Due south. About half way up.
@IrishFoodGuide no, I don't think so, Venus is off to the southwest this is southeast of us and rising. @janet_t_55 @JeniPim
@JeniPim no bother, thanks Jeni.
There is a very twinkly star to the s southeast quite low in the sky It seems to be changing colour. What is it please? @janet_t_55 @JeniPim
@vencut2 no bother, thank you for trying. 💐🌟
@vencut2 quite low in the sky.
@vencut2 south southeast moon not up yet. I'm in Co Cork Ireland.
@vencut2 saw them, what's the very twinkley one to the east? Seems to change colour.
@IrPsych @dubliner24 beautiful! Very pretty duckys.
@JillianBolger she might have been a blow-in?
@OLDEFARM @pigoftheday very glad to hear it!
Just watched Mr @TanneryDungarva trying to milk a cow, best laugh today 😊
Go Lillian! Go Justin! #thearchers
@pigoftheday @OLDEFARM they'd look great ................................somewhere!
@OLDEFARM I wouldn't, but I'm not you.
@OLDEFARM you didn't buy them, did you?
@RunDmcCork oh dear, hope he made it?
Just split these! Very therapeutic. https://t.co/9fa9m63BJZ
@IrPsych combined with a pout! I hope the wind changes ;)
@RunDmcCork "@CorkSafetyAlert: Reports of a multi-vehicle collision on the South Ring Road (N40) by the Douglas Exit (Westbound.) Extreme."
Has there been a altercation at the café on the corner? #thearchers
@BibiBaskin Might take a bit longer for the gug, is there somewhere Ms Robin could be fed that Betsey can't get to?
@BibiBaskin She's looking so well! #Betseythehen
@JillianBolger 2/2 Is there a recognisable 'd' at the end of an other word? the stroke below the line is odd.
@JillianBolger Hi, looks like Richmond, but the 'ch' isn't very like the 'ch' in Michael on the line below. The pen seems to running out.1/2
@TelegraphFood did yous see this? @BlackDistillery
@wholesomeIE will do tomorrow, Friday pm, bit knackered now.
@BibiBaskin @MaryMc_31 He makes my skin creep, same way CJH did. I'm hoping checks & balances keep his more extreme ideas don't get okayed.
@BibiBaskin It seemed to have been only last year ;-)
@BibiBaskin @MaryMc_31 That's good to know.
@vandracarolyn so long as the taxpayer doesn't have to pick up the bill!!!!!
@BibiBaskin spotted you, in the channel 4 documentary about Trump last night, interviewing his mother.
@davewalker @diamondgeezer I don't think he's a particularly good watercolourist.
@Gremkoska It is beautiful!
@MadsMcKeever @tomdoorley @SkodaIRL @BlackwaterMotor yes, looking forward to it!
@Nutradvance they are on the menu here for the second night in a row!
@AlisKitchenCork Spread the love! https://t.co/xE6r1YxdBP
@italianfoodie Just had something similar at home. Tasty!
@BibiBaskin I was busy yesterday, just catching up now.
@BibiBaskin I hope today only brings you good things! 💐
@damienmulley if we tax sugar we have an increased revenue stream to deal with the effects of over consumption of sugar & to educate people.
@JLM_cork no, he put her down when I came up to bed. @tomdoorley
@carnsoreboxer morning
@davewalker three piles, keep, clothes bank, rags! Then wish them well on their new life journey as you move on.
@riacann nah, all a bit on the autism spectrum, methinks!
